abilities.name: Aberrant Quickness
abilities.description: The choker can take an extra action on its turn.
abilities.recharge: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

abilities.name: Boneless.
abilities.description: The choker can move through and occupy a space as narrow as 4 inches wide without squeezing.

abilities.name: Spider Climb.
abilities.description: The choker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
